items.title: Sony’s Dazzling New RGB LED TV Comes in 2026

items.title: Researchers Propose a Better Way to Report Dangerous AI Flaws
items.description: After identifying major flaws in popular AI models, researchers are pushing for a new system to identify and report bugs.

items.title: The United States of Elon Musk Inc.

items.title: Companies Might Soon Have to Tell You When Their Products Will Die
items.description: If everything’s computer, it would be nice to know how long computer last.

items.title: How to Set Up Your New iPhone (2025)
